channel.title: Need help- making command level restricted
channel.description:
hey guys im just wondering is there a way to make a command what level 20's and lower can only use, and level 21's and higher not use?
thank you for reading. :)

item.title: Need help- making command level restricted
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“wayo0o, post:8, topic:550716”]thankyou, i will look for what i need to put in there

code iv made so far && (c.playerLevel[Player.level] >= 20)) {
…^^^^…thats a error tho

thanks sk8

UPDATE iv Solved it

            if (playerCommand.equals("****") && (c.combatLevel <= 20)) {
                c.getPA().startTeleport(3237, 2771, 0, "modern");
                c.sendMessage("*********");[/quote]

nice useful

Read full topic
item.source: Need help- making command level restricted

item.title: Need help- making command level restricted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

wayo0o:

am i right in thinking >= 20)) is level 20+ and <= 20)) lower?

= stands for “Greater than or equal to”
<= stands for “Less than or equal to”
== stands for "equal to"
For a full list of Operators, click here

You didn’t provide much information about your server, and is why Zymus can’t give you code that is more related to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help- making command level restricted

item.title: Need help- making command level restricted
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

wayo0o:

am i right in thinking >= 20)) is level 20+ and <= 20)) lower?

Yes, >= 20 is anything higher, and including, 20 (20, 21, 22, 23, 21470000, etc). <= is anything lower and including 20 (20, 19, 18, 17, -1112344)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help- making command level restricted

item.title: Need help- making command level restricted
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Just add a requirement to the command

if (command.equals("commandname") && player.getCombatLevel() <= 20) {
    // do stuff
}

Read full topic
